plot: A depressed man ponders the decisions he has made in the wake of his fathers sudden death, questioning his faith in his religion as well as himself.
title: Purgatory
plot_es: A depressed man ponders the decisions he has made in the wake of his fathers sudden death, questioning his faith in his religion as well as himself.
plot_en: A depressed man ponders the decisions he has made in the wake of his fathers sudden death, questioning his faith in his religion as well as himself.
